name: Disconnected (Welinton Faria, hagnak, Breno-D)
description:
Disconnected (Welinton Faria, hagnak, Breno-D) is a platformer game developed by hagnak, Breno-D and Welinton Faria. It came out on 12-07-2020.
Disconnected (Welinton Faria, hagnak, Breno-D) is available on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
